item.title: Ubuntu Pre Compiled Kernel Upgrade
item.description: Ubuntu Pre-Compiled Kernel Installation About If you are not familar with Ubuntu - a good overveiw of this execellent free operating system’s features can be found here: Ubuntu The instructions below are for obtaining and installing a pre-compiled Ubuntu kernel, from the ubuntu.com kernel web site. The instructions explain how a computer already running the Ubuntu operating system can use the latest Ubuntu kernel available from the Ubuntu Kernel web site.
